title: Madeira Levada Walks Guide: Trails, Tips & Hiking Info 2026 - Beyond Madeira – The All-in-One Travel Guide
text: What to Know Before Hiking ⚠️ Important: New Hiking Rules & Fees for 2026 Starting in 2026, all PR walking trails require mandatory time-slot reservations through the official SIMplifica platform. This new system includes booking fees, specific time windows, and digital confirmations. Standard Fee €4.50 per person PR1 (Pico Areeiro) €10.50 after April Time Slots 30-minute blocks Booking Online only (no cash) Everything you need to know: how to book, payment process, multi-day passes, cancellation rules, and guided tour exemptions — all explained step-by-step. Read the Complete Guide →Trail Reservation & Access Fee Visit IFCN’s site to confirm the levada is open and safe. Pay the €3 Fee Book online through Simplifica 24h before your hike begins.
